U

Unicorn - Class in monster
Unicorn, a rarer type of monster, Stronger but more expensive Not a starter Monster but can be brought at the shop mid Health, high Attack, Medium Defence

userBuyItem(int) - Method in class cli.ShopCLI
Method that processes a user's request to purchase a new item Check's whether a user has enough gold to purchase the item Should there be enough gold, the transaction is processed in this method If there is not enough gold, the user is informed and the method is returned
